languages.text: "Если бы меня как его били, я бы и не такого наболтал. Хранит меня Император, хранит..."
"If I'd been beaten like him, I would have said all this and more. The Emperor does protect me..."
languages.original_text: "Если бы меня как его били, я бы и не такого наболтал. Хранит меня Император, хранит..."

traits.locale_text: "If I had been beaten like him, I would have said all this and more. The Emperor does protect me..."
"If I had been beaten like him, I would have said all this and more. The Emperor does protect me..."
"If I had been beaten like him, I would have said all this and more. The Emperor does protect me..."
"If I had been beaten like him, I would have said all this and more. The Emperor does protect me..."
"If I'd been beaten like him, I would have said all this and more. The Emperor does protect me..."
"If I'd been beaten like him, I would have said all this and more. The Emperor does protect me..."
"If I'd been beaten like him, I would have said all this and more. The Emperor does protect me..."

languages.text: "Wäre ich so verprügelt worden, hätte ich all das und noch mehr gesagt. Der Imperator beschützt mich ..."
languages.original_text: "If I'd been beaten like him, I would have said all this and more. The Emperor does protect me..."

traits.locale_text: "Wäre ich so verprügelt worden, hätte ich all das und noch mehr gesagt. Der Imperator beschützt mich ..."

languages.text: « Si j'avais été battu comme lui, j'aurais été tout aussi bavard, si ce n'est plus. L'Empereur doit vraiment me protéger... »
languages.original_text: "If I'd been beaten like him, I would have said all this and more. The Emperor does protect me..."

traits.locale_text: « Si j'avais été battu comme lui, j'aurais été tout aussi bavard, si ce n'est plus. L'Empereur doit vraiment me protéger... »

languages.text: «Si me dieran una paliza así, yo también confesaría lo que fuese. El Emperador me ha protegido...».
languages.original_text: "If I'd been beaten like him, I would have said all this and more. The Emperor does protect me..."

traits.locale_text: «Si me dieran una paliza así, yo también confesaría lo que fuese. El Emperador me ha protegido...».

languages.text: 「あいつのようにぶちのめされたのが私だったとしたら、きっとあれこれ話していたよ。皇帝は私をお守りくださっている…」
languages.original_text: "If I'd been beaten like him, I would have said all this and more. The Emperor does protect me..."

traits.locale_text: 「あいつのようにぶちのめされたのが私だったとしたら、きっとあれこれ話していたよ。皇帝は私をお守りくださっている…」

languages.text: “要是我像他一样被揍得那么惨，我也一样能说出那些话来，甚至会比他还活灵活现。愿帝皇保佑我……”
languages.original_text: "If I'd been beaten like him, I would have said all this and more. The Emperor does protect me..."

traits.locale_text: “要是我像他一样被揍得那么惨，我也一样能说出那些话来，甚至会比他还活灵活现。愿帝皇保佑我……”

languages.text: "Ben de onun gibi dayak yeseydim tüm bunları anlatır, üstüne de devam ederdim. İmparator beni gerçekten koruyor..."
languages.original_text: "If I'd been beaten like him, I would have said all this and more. The Emperor does protect me..."
